PHP Common

test

use Tivins\Core\System\Terminal;

require 'vendor/autoload.php';

$a = ['test' => 2];
var_dump($a);
Terminal::sleep(1);
++$a['test'];
var_dump($a);
Terminal::sleep(0.2);
